summary:
I am turely a European citizen who was born in Bulgaria, grew up in Turkey, lived in Cyprus for 8 years, became an experienced English teacher (also by studying the American & English Culture and Literature) and finally got married to a Dutch citizen and lives in Holland now. 

I worked in international schools and had chance to teach English as a second language in multinational classrooms.

I always take my job so serious. For me, it is very important that my students will do their best and at the end of the semester they can express themselves easily in English (both oral and written). 

I like using creative projects that students can both use their creativity and practice English.

projects: [{'title': 'Video project', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'That was a project that a text was divided into 20 sections. The students were supposed to find a tourist (English Speaker) and take their video while the tourist were reading one section. Then they had to combine all the sections into 1 video that makes the text meaningful. Also, they had to do the same thing with Turkish speakers as well. At the end, there were 2 versions of the same text (one read by tourists and the other one read by Turks)\n\nHere the aim of the project was providing an enjoyable environment for the students that they can practice English and develop more self-confidence. Also, it was aimed to show the importance of pronunciation as well.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Anelia Filipova', 'last_name': 'Milanova', 'name': None, 'headline': 'AB-hibe.com şirketinde Teacher trainer'}]}]
